document_name: Law and Order Trust Fund for Afghanistan (LOTFA IV)
Evaluation of Law and Order Trust Fund for Afghanistan

donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
outputs.output_descr:
Coverage of all police force under EPS

Output 1: Police force is supported to perform their job effectively and efficiently.
Output 2: Financial and project management capacity build within MoI.
Output 3: Police force is equipped with required equipment for improvement of their mobility and responsiveness.
Output 4: Improved working and living conditions of police contributing to better efficiency and morale.
Output 5: Improved capacity in police force with enhanced gender balance.
outputs.output_title: Law & Order Trust Fund for Afg

project_descr: Law & Order Trust Fund for Afghanistan Phase V
